title: Always Wanted....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Honoka-chan, you, Kotori-chan, and Umi-chan are childhood friends, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, we are~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>How does it feel to have a friend that attended the same school since you were little?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>How, huh....? Let’s see.... I guess it’s like having a family outside? But why did you ask?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’ve always wanted a childhood friend.... So I was wondering what it would feel like. Having someone that knows everything about you and is always with you must be nice, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha.... It’s exactly because they know everything that you can’t hide things from them....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Like your grades, or your grades, or.... your grades. Aaaah! There’s a test coming up~~~! Hey, Riko-chan, please help me prepare for it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, I’d be happy to teach you what I know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Aaaah, you’re so kind, Riko-chan! Thank you~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
